function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased overgrowth of aquatic vegetation leading to low dissolved oxygen levels and stagnant water areas","Impact":"Creates a habitat suitable for mosquito oviposition and reduces diversity of wildlife habitat","Mitigation":"Proper maintenance of bodies of water to prevent overgrowth of vegetation","Technologies":"Water circulation systems, nutrient control methods, and aquatic vegetation management strategies","People":"People living near water bodies, environmental authorities, and water resource management organizations","Owner":"Environmental authorities, water resource management organizations, and local government"},{"Description":"Excessive growth of algae and cyanobacteria in urban ponds","Impact":"Development of toxic blooms, interference with recreation activities, and unpleasant odor emissions","Mitigation":"Implementation of water circulation systems, nutrient control methods, and algae management strategies","Technologies":"Water circulation systems, nutrient control methods, and algae management strategies","People":"People living near urban ponds, recreational users of the ponds, and environmental authorities","Owner":"Environmental authorities, water resource management organizations, and local government"}]}
